thread.title: Western Union May Head South With PayPal Deal
thread.title_full: Western Union May Head South With PayPal Deal

title: Western Union May Head South With PayPal Deal
text:
Hot Research PM Western Union May Head South With PayPal Deal PayPal’s pact to acquire Xoom will create a global competitor for Western Union in money transfer. July 2, 2015 1:18 p.m. ET 
Western Union (WU: NYSE) 
By Evercore ISI ($20.39, July 1, 2015) 
We are downgrading Western Union from Buy to Hold given PayPal’s announcement of a definitive agreement to acquire Hold-rated Xoom, creating a large, global competitor for Western Union... Get The Full Story
